title: Elliot Daly deserves to have question mark removed from the back of his shirt after display against Argentina
text:
Elliot Daly did not enjoy his first encounter with Argentina three years ago at Twickenham. His match lasted just four minutes before he was sent off for upending No 8 Leonardo Senatore in mid-air becoming an unlikely addition to a rogue’s gallery of England players to be sent off alongside Danny Grewcock, Simon Shaw and Mike Burton.

He will have a lot fonder memories of this encounter against the Pumas in Tokyo. This time it was second row Tomas Lavanini who received the early marching orders, paving the way for a comfortable and none-too-taxing victory that confirms England’s passage into the knockout stages. Just as significantly from Daly’s perspective, this was his most assured performance...
description: Elliot Daly did not enjoy his first encounter with Argentina three years ago at Twickenham.
